channel.title: Autospawn problem
channel.description:
I've just downloaded this blank source and I need to start my autospawn.cfg from scratch. Everytime I try to add an NPC, I compile, and then I get this error when loading the source, screenshot: http://puu.sh/L5gV
I dont know if I'm having a space too much somewhere, but I've copied that code from an other site, so i dont know why it isnt working. This is what I type: spawn = 1 3222 3218 0 0 0 0 1 Man
I'm trying to spawn a man(id 1) to that coordination. Am I typing someting wrong? Also if someone could paste a copy of what I should be typing in autospawn to see if it work it would be great.

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @dragoonic dragoonic
item.description:
@dragoonic wrote:

Nice! It worked, thanks guys =)

Read full topic

are you using ‘Tabs’ or spaces? Use tabs

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @dragoonic dragoonic
item.description:
@dragoonic wrote:

ravekitty:

Take off the 1 at the end ~_~

I took off the 1 and it didn’t work, I’ve place a 0 instead of the 1 also and that didn’t work too =/

These are what I tryed:
spawn = 1 3222 3218 0 0 0 0 0 Man

spawn = 1 3222 3218 0 0 0 0 Man

Read full topic
